title: It's Elementary
teaser: We hope you're "in your element" for this quiz, because every answer contains the name of an element from the periodic table.
contentencoded:
We hope you're "in your element" for this quiz, because every answer contains the name of an element from the periodic table.

Heard in Episode 324: His Dark Material
